name: Magnetic Pairs
description: A game made in combination of arcade and easy-logic gameplay styles. You need to magnetize and connect all orbs with a same color in tasks for logic and fast reaction.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Processor 2.6 Ghz or better Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Graphical Card with 256 megabytes of video memory and support of DirectX 9.0. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio
